scope.title: Software Development and Architecture: Summary and games
scope.description: A relaxed recap of the key ideas in software development and architecture, with games, labs, and extra practice.
scope.summary: A relaxed recap of the key ideas in software development and architecture, with games, labs, and extra practice.
learningObjectives: Explain the core architecture ideas from the track in plain language.
Apply patterns to short scenarios and identify the key trade offs.
Analyse common failure stories and what design signals were missed.
Evaluate what you would practise next to improve judgement.

headings.title: You made it to the end
One page recap of the big ideas
